name: William Monroe Tolbert
bio: When William Monroe Tolbert was born on 28 June 1870, in Alabama, United States, his father, Cornelius Tolbert, was 23 and his mother, Maria J Beaman, was 31. He married Mary Rosetta Quates on 22 April 1895, in Conecuh, Alabama, United States. They were the parents of at least 3 sons and 4 daughters. He lived in Election Precinct 9 Oldtown, Conecuh, Alabama, United States in 1900 and McKenzie, Butler, Alabama, United States for about 20 years. He died on 8 August 1942, in Bay Minette, Baldwin, Alabama, United States, at the age of 72, and was buried in McKenzie, Butler, Alabama, United States.
